http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Alteration characterized by introduction of various sulphide minerals as veinlets in rock body. Silica and other minerals may accompany sulphides in veinlets; alteration halos around veinlets are tricky to describe--TBD!.
